constraint: The email shall contain a space character.
The email shall start with a @ character.
The email shall have either no @ characters or more than one @ character.
function:
def this_function(s: str) -> bool:
    ''' 
    Check if the email shall have either no @ characters or more than one @ character.
    
    Returns True if the condition is met, otherwise False.
    '''
    at_count = s.count('@')
    return at_count != 1

constraint: If the email contains a @ character, then the email shall not include any dot characters (.) after the @ character and before the end.
function:
def this_function(s: str) -> bool:
    ''' 
    Check if the email contains a @ character, then ensure 
    the email does not include any dot characters (.) after 
    the @ character and before the end.
    '''
    if '@' in s:
        # Find the position of '@'
        at_index = s.index('@')
        # Check for '.' after '@'
        if '.' in s[at_index:]:
            return False
    # If no '@' or no '.' after '@', return True
    return True
